Class TotalHybridHeader

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.appia.protocols.total.hybrid.TotalHybridHeader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TotalHybridHeader
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Message Header to be added to the protocol events.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader()
Default constructor

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader(int type,
                         int source,
                         int seq,
                         int sequencer,
                         Ticket[] tickets)
Constructs a header object for normal messages (DATA, GOINGACTIVE, GOINGPASSIVE).

Parameters:
type - Type of header. Should be DATA, GOINGACTIVE or GOINGPASSIVE.
source - Sender of the message.
seq - Sequence number.
sequencer - the sequencer ID of the message
tickets - Array of tickets that are piggybanked in the messages.

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader(int source,
                         int from,
                         int to,
                         int sequencer)
Construcs an header object for REASSING messages.

Parameters:
source - Sender of the message.
from - The new sequencer must order from this message.
to - The last message that the new sequencer must order.
sequencer - The new sequencer.

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader(Ticket[] t)
Construct an header for messages only with ticket information

Parameters:
t - array of tickets

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader(int source,
                         int seq)
Contructs a PENDING header

Parameters:
source - source of the message
seq - sequence of the message

TotalHybridHeader

public TotalHybridHeader(Message om,
                         int f)
Contructs a header from a Appia Message

Parameters:
om - Appia Message
f - source
Method Detail

getType

public int getType()
Return the type of the event.

Returns:
Type of the event.

getSource

public int getSource()
Return the rank of the sender of the event.

Returns:
Sender of the event.

getSequence

public int getSequence()
Return the sequence number of the event

Returns:
Sequence number.

getSequencer

public int getSequencer()
Return the new sequencer of a set of messages. This should only be used in REASSING events.

Returns:
The new Sequencer.

getTickets

public Ticket[] getTickets()
Return an array of tickets.

Returns:
Tickets.

getFrom

public int getFrom()
Return the first message that the sequencer must change. Only to be used by the REASSING event.

Returns:
The first message.

getTo

public int getTo()
Return the last message that the sequencer must change. Only to be used by the REASSING event.

Returns:
The last message.

setSequencer

public void setSequencer(int newseq)
Change the sequencer of an event.

Parameters:
newseq - The new sequencer.

writeHeader

public void writeHeader(Message om)
Serializes the header into an Appia Message

Parameters:
om - Appia Message where to put the header information
